verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Yet <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5061>plague<s%> more will I <S%H935>bring<s%> on <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and on <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H310>afterwards<s%> he will let you <S%H7971>go.<s%> When he lets you <S%H7971>go,<s%> he will <S%H1644>surely<s%> thrust you <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H3617>altogether.<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> now in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and let them <S%H7592>ask<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and every <S%H802>woman<s%> of her <S%H7468>neighbor,<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%> Moreover the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "This is what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>says:<s%> <S%H3915><s%> 'About midnight I will go <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

and all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> from the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> who <S%H3427>sits<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> even to the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the female servant who is <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H7347>mill;<s%> and all the firstborn of <S%H1060>livestock.<s%>

There shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> such as there has not <S%H3808>been,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall be any <S%H3254>more.<s%>

But against any of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H2782>won't<s%> even bark or move its <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> against <S%H376>man<s%> or <S%H929>animal;<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> makes a <S%H6395>distinction<s%> between the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

All these your <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3381>me,<s%> and bow down themselves to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, "Get <S%H3318>out,<s%> with all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H7272>follow<s%> <S%H310>you;<s%>" and after that I will go <S%H3318>out.<s%>'" He went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> in <S%H2750>hot<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6547>"Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>won't<s%> listen to <S%H4159>you,<s%> that my wonders may be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> all these <S%H4159>wonders<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he <S%H1121>didn't<s%> let the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> go <S%H7971>out<s%> of his <S%H776>land.<s%>
